Imparfait (Imperfect).J'envoyais: I used to send, I used to throw
Imparfait (Imperfect).Tu envoyais: You used to send, You used to throw
Imparfait (Imperfect).Il/Elle envoyait: He/She used to send, He/She used to throw
Imparfait (Imperfect).Nous envoyions: We used to send, We used to throw
Imparfait (Imperfect).Vous envoyiez: You used to send, You used to throw (formal)
Imparfait (Imperfect).Ils/Elles envoyaient: They used to send, They used to throw

Futur simple (Simple Future).J'enverrai: I will send, I will throw
Futur simple (Simple Future).Tu enverras: You will send, You will throw
Futur simple (Simple Future).Il/Elle enverra: He/She will send, He/She will throw
Futur simple (Simple Future).Nous enverrons: We will send, We will throw
Futur simple (Simple Future).Vous enverrez: You will send, You will throw (formal)
Futur simple (Simple Future).Ils/Elles enverront: They will send, They will throw
